select id, name, email, phone, role, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from users where role = 'STUDENT'
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and id = #{id}
order by created_at desc

select u.id, u.name, s.student_no as studentNo from users u join students s on u.id = s.user_id where u.role = 'STUDENT'
and u.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
order by u.name asc
